text: Joseph Jean-Pierre Marc Garneau (born February 23, 1949) is a Canadian politician and former astronaut. In 2021, he became Minister of Foreign Affairs. He is a member of the Liberal Party. Garneau is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Notre-Dame-de-Grâce—Westmount. On October 5, 1984, he became the first Canadian in outer space as part of STS-41-G and won two Space Shuttle missions—STS-77 and STS-97. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian astronauts Category:Politicians from Quebec
title: Marc Garneau
